### Government Tender Announcement

#### Request for Standing Offer for Road Salt

*   **Tender Title:** RISO - Road Salt - CCGC Southside Base - F6879-231537
*   **Publication Date:** December 13, 2023
*   **Tender Closing Date:** January 4, 2024, 2:00 PM (Local Time)
*   **Contracting Entity:** Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
*   **Contact Information:**
    *   Name: Shawn Trahan (SPAC/PSPC)
    *   Email: shawn.trahan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
    *   Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18271127?extsite=MTgyNzExMjdfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

#### Description
Canada is seeking offers for the supply and delivery of sodium chloride rock salt with anti-caking compound, bulk highway, on an “as and when requested” basis. The procurement will be conducted according to a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) process.

#### Key Information

*   **UNSPSC Code:** 47131823 (Deicers or defrosters)
*   **Trade Agreements:**
    *   Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
    *   Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
    *   Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
    *   Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
    *   Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
    *   Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
*   **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
*   **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

#### Notice Type and Solicitation Details
This is a Request for Standing Offer (RFSO) under the solicitation number WS4322127525. The RFSO is open to all qualified suppliers who meet the requirements outlined in the solicitation document.

#### Bidders Instructions
Bidders are required to submit a bid in accordance with the instructions outlined in the solicitation document. A debriefing may be requested by bidders who are unsuccessful in their bid. To submit a request for debriefing, bidders should contact the Contracting Authority within 15 working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
